Title: Severe Weather Emergency Protocol - Brighton and Hove
Body:
Due to severe weather conditions, additional emergency accommodation and support services are now available in Brighton and Hove.

Emergency Accommodation

  • Emergency shelter spaces available at several locations
  • No appointment necessary - walk-in service available
  • Hot meals and warm drinks provided

Support Services

  • 24/7 helpline available
  • Outreach teams patrolling the city
  • Transport to shelter available
ShortMessage: Emergency accommodation and services are available due to severe weather conditions.
